item.title: Thesis projects
item.description: My bachelor thesis project Title: Autovalori e stati legati dellâ€™Hamiltoniana in presenza del potenziale di Yukawa The thesis project was written in Italian, in it I looked for eigenvalues and eigenstates of the Hamiltonian of a system with Yukawa potential, enhancing the removal of Coulomb degeneracy of states with same quantum number $n$. The thesis is available at the following link: Riccardo Marinelli Thesis
